LightningComponentBundle.description: Component to display a records related list

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon name
property.description: On the format category:iconName. See available icons: https://lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/

property.name: headerColor
property.label: Header color
property.datasource: white, whitesmoke, lightgray, gainsboro, beige, aliceblue, azure, lightgoldenrodyellow, honeydew, khaki, lavender, wheat

property.name: maxHeight
property.label: List Max Height
property.description: The maximum height the list is allowed to consume on the layout (in em)

property.name: relatedObjectApiName
property.label: Object API name for the related list

property.name: relationField
property.label: API name of field relating the records to the parent

property.name: parentRelationField
property.label: API name of field relating the parent to the records

property.name: displayedFields
property.label: Fields to display (API names, comma separated)

property.name: columnLabels
property.label: Labels for the table columns (match the order of the displayed fields input)

property.name: dynamicUpdate
property.label: Dynamic Update
property.description: Set to true if an update to the parent record should trigger a list refresh

property.name: clickableRows
property.label: Clickable Rows
property.description: Enables row clicks to navigate to the record in the list

property.name: popoverFields
property.label: Popover Fields
property.description: Additional fields (comma separated) to show in the popover

property.name: inactiveRecordFilter
property.label: Inactive Record Filter
property.description: Enter a SOQL condition (e.g., Active__c = false). Records meeting this condition will be styled as inactive.
